meta.title: EduPro Investors | Join the EdTech Revolution in Africa
meta.description: 40 billion FCFA market. Zero dominant player. We're launching in 30 days. Join visionary investors in transforming professional training in Africa.
meta.keywords: EdTech investment, Africa startup, seed round, professional training platform, education technology, Africa investment

hero.title: 40 billion FCFA market.
hero.subtitle: EduPro is the first platform connecting companies, professionals, trainers and investors around professional training in Africa. We're opening our SEED round to visionary investors.

opportunity.title: The Opportunity in 3 Numbers
opportunity.subtitle: A massive market in full growth without a consolidated leader

market.title: Total Market
market.description: Size of the professional training market in our 3 launch countries (Senegal, Ivory Coast, Rwanda)

growth.title: Market Growth
growth.description: Annual growth of the EdTech sector in Africa, accelerated post-COVID and by public policies

leader.title: Dominant Leader
leader.description: Massively fragmented market, opportunity to create the pan-African leader in professional training

whyEdupro.title: We solve a problem that no one else addresses
whyEdupro.subtitle: The problem exists at 3 levels

points: No way to measure training ROI

trainers.title: For Trainers

Visibility limited to their geographic area

ai.title: AI at the Service of Africa

options.no: No, this would be my first

nextSteps.title: Section 4: Next Steps
nextSteps.call: Schedule a call with the CEO (15-30 min)

revenue.q: You don't have revenue yet, why invest now?
revenue.a: Because this is when you can enter at the best valuation, with a proven team that executes. In 6 months with traction, the terms will be different.

valuation.a: We discuss valuation with each investor based on what they bring (capital + network + expertise). Contact us to discuss.

ticket.a: We're flexible on the minimum ticket for SEED. What matters is vision alignment and what you bring beyond capital.

lead.q: Are you looking for a lead investor?
lead.a: Ideally yes, someone who takes the lead of the round and mobilizes their network. But we're open to multiple aligned investors.

profitability.q: When do you plan to be profitable?
profitability.a: Breakeven target: 18-24 months post-launch. But the intermediate goal is growth and validation of product-market fit.

seriesA.a: We want to validate our traction with the right SEED partner first. Series A will come naturally in 12-18 months with the right metrics.

cta.title: The best opportunities are taken early
cta.subtitle: In 6 months, we'll have numbers. Today, you have the opportunity to enter at the best conditions, with a team that executes and a massive market ahead of us.
cta.highlight: Investors building tomorrow's Africa invest today.
